turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I wanted to get a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk, no foam from the Starbucks in Manchester.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was a bit fast. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk and no foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti caramel machiatto, whole milk and no foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, adding whipped cream to your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Elm Street in Manchester.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on elm st.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That's perfect. Anything else, or What's that?
